upgradeDesc.speed: Increase ship speed by {:.2f}%. Total after buy {:.2f}%.
upgradeDesc.damage: Increase damage mult by {:.2f}%. Total after buy {:.2f}%.
upgradeDesc.fireRate: Decrease weapons cooldown by {:.2f}%. Total after buy {:.2f}%.
upgradeDesc.projectileCount: Increase the amount of projectiles shot by {:.0f} (Laser Ray is not a projectile). Total after buy +{:.0f}
upgradeDesc.experience: Increase the value of experience obtained by {:.2f}%. Total after buy {:.2f}%.
upgradeDesc.goldProb: Increase the gold probaility to {:.2f}%. Total after buy {:.2f}%.
upgradeDesc.goldValue: Increase the value of experience obtained by {:.2f}%. Total after buy {:.2f}%.
upgradeDesc.pickupRange: Increase the range of automatic pickup by {:.0f}. Total after buy {:.0f}.
upgradeDesc.healthRegen: Increase the health regeneration by {:.2f} health/s. Total after buy {:.2f} health/s.
upgradeDesc.maxHealth: Increase base max health by {:.2f}%. Total after buy {:.2f}%.
upgradeDesc.armor: Decrease damage received by {:.2f}%. Total after buy {:.2f}%.
abilityDesc.laserGun: Shoot laser shots from the front of the ship.
abilityDesc.rocket: Shoot rockets that explode and do damage area. The rockets come out arond the ship, starting from the right.
abilityDesc.laser: Shoot a masive laser ray that deals damage to multiple asteroids from the front of the ship
abilityDesc.explosives: Leave explosives behind you that explode after a short period of time and do damage area.
abilityDesc.gravitySaw: You find an advance technology that let's you manipulate gravity on certain metal rotating around the ship and doing damage to asteroids.
abilityDesc.pickupRange: Increase the range of automatic pickup.
abilityDesc.projectileCount: Increase the amount of projectiles shot.
abilityDesc.size: Increase the size of all your weapons.
abilityDesc.projectileSpeed: Increase the speed of your projectiles.
abilityLvlUp.pickupRange: Increase the range of automatic pickup to: {}
abilityLvlUp.projectileCount: Increase the total amount of projectiles shot in {}.
abilityLvlUp.size: Increase the size of all your weapons by {}%
abilityLvlUp.projectileSpeed: Increase the speed of your projectiles to {}%
